remarks: Properties that determine a subgroup.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
issubgoi.1 $e |- G e. GrpOp $.
issubgoi.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
issubgoi.3 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
issubgoi.4 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
issubgoi.5 $e |- Y C_ X $.
issubgoi.6 $e |- H = ( G |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
issubgoi.7 $e |- ( ( x e. Y /\ y e. Y ) -> ( x G y ) e. Y ) $.
issubgoi.8 $e |- U e. Y $.
issubgoi.9 $e |- ( x e. Y -> ( N ` x ) e. Y ) $.
issubgoi $p |- H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) $.
$d H x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d N y $.
$d U x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d Y x y $.
